p: Chemical composition. Iridoid and secoiridoid glucosides and ester derivatives ( Rastrelli et al., 1998); essential oil (thymol, limonene, carvacrol, as the major components) ( Compadre et al., 1987; Uribe-Hern√°ndez et al., 1992); lipids (esterols) and flavonoids (e.g., pinocembrin, luteolin, apigenin, quercetin and derivatives) ( Lin et al., 2007; Arias et al., 2020); rosmarinic acid ( Compadre et al., 1987).
